title: Shopify: Activación automática (3 pasos)
description: This n8n workflow uses 3 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems, and perform actions without human intervention.

title: Onfleet: Activación automática
description: This n8n workflow uses 2 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks.

title: Onfleet: Activación automática
description: Automatización que se activa cuando ocurren eventos en Onfleet y integra 2 servicios.

title: Set: Activación automática (Workflow avanzado - 8 pasos)
description: Automatización que se activa cuando ocurren eventos en Set y integra 5 servicios, realiza 4 tipos de acciones.
